Title: Object: La Vierge a la Coquille
Series: Musée Royal
Description: The rest on the flight into Egypt, with the Virgin gathering water from a stream with a shell, while the infant Baptist hands Christ an apple. c.1803/18 Etching and engraving
Producer name: Print made by: Henri Charles Müller (engraver)
Curator's comments: From 'Musée Royal', see 1853,1008.115 for comment. The painting is Spear 19 (now in the Musée Mandet, Riom).
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (undescribed) (Desaulx)
